subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Joe Corvo scored with 2 minutes 40 seconds remaining and Michael Leighton made 22 saves Friday night to give Peter Laviolette the N.H.L. record for most victories by a United States-born coach.
snippet: Joe Corvo scored with 2 minutes 40 seconds remaining and Michael Leighton made 22 saves Friday night to give Peter Laviolette the N.H.L. record for most victories by a United States-born coach.
